content.text:
# Arrianus (historian)

Arrianus () was a historian of ancient Greece, who lived at, or shortly after, the time of Gaius Julius Verus Maximus, and wrote a history of emperor Maximinus Thrax and the Gordiani.
It is not improbable that he may be the same as Lucius Annius Arrianus, who is mentioned as consul in 243 CE.
